oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Skylines, v. 2, no. 1, November 13, 1943
Sky lines; Skyline; Sky line
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 11th College Training Detachment, Army Air Forces
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Skylines was a publication of the 11th College Training Detachment at MTSC during World War II. This issue has articles about Sgt. Edward Hand; Aviation students giving a program at Central High School; an average day of a CTD student; a comparison of the Army and Navy Air Corps; the Army Air Forces' recruitment of 'Air-Wacs'; and the wives' club. The issue includes a marriage announcement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Newspapers; United States. Army Air Forces. College Training Detachment, 11th; World War, 1939-1945; Middle Tennessee State College;
